title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with wearable health-monitoring devices so that I can track my vital signs and share real-time health data with my caregivers.

title: Emergency Alert Activation
summary: As an older adult, I want to activate an emergency alert using a simple voice command so that I can quickly notify caregivers or emergency services in case of a health crisis or fall.

title: Medication Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my medications and receive reminders for intake and refills so that I can manage my health effectively and maintain my independence.

title: Caregiver Communication
summary: As an older adult, I want my caregiver to have access to my health data and medication schedules so that they can provide better support and care for me.

title: Personalized Health Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to analyze my health data and provide personalized health and wellness recommendations so that I can manage my physical activity and dietary needs effectively.

title: Health Progress Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want to track my health progress over time so that I can visualize changes in my health metrics and receive motivational feedback.
